title: In music, what is the difference between Antara and Mukhda? - Quora

response.answer_text: No need to be puzled. Antara and mukhda are both the same and share the same meaning. Mukhda as the name suggests is the starting of the song meaning mukh(mouth). And Antara means through which we enter (antar)… no difference at all!

Hi Santrupt,Thanks for A2A! The best answers are given in the links below:Indian Classical Music: What is the difference between Antara & Mukhda?https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antara_(music)https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hindustani_classical_musichttp://learnraagabasics.blogspot.in/ Hope it helps!Regards,Bharat.Raj
